| HistoryText             = Cell Combattre was on of the most violent cells of the [[Front de Liberation du Quebec (Earth-616)|Front de Liberation du Quebec]],{{r|Marvel Fanfare #28}} a sovereignty movement, or inspired by them.{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Canada]]'s entry}} The group was comprised of six core members with a seventh member acting as courier. The Cell Combattre was infamous for its attack on an [[Royal Canadian Mounted Police (Earth-616)|RCMP]] station at Christmas time where all the police officers were slain. Eventually, the group retired and returned to semi-normal lives, hoping that no one would determine their true identity. When one of the leaders was murdered, it was revealed that [[Jean-Paul Beaubier (Earth-616)|Northstar]] was the seventh member.

A vigilante, [[Giles McHeath (Earth-616)|Scourge]], was out to kill off the remaining Cell members. Northstar attempted to save the remaining members. [[Alpha Flight (Earth-616)|Alpha Flight]] felt the need to offer their assistance to Jean-Paul and followed him by using the microchip he was implanted with as a member of Alpha Flight. Unknown to Alpha Flight, they were being followed by the murderer, Scourge, and only realized it when all but two of the members were dead.{{r|Marvel Fanfare Vol 1 28}}
